class plumetrack.plumetrack_config.config_script.MainFrame[source]¶

Bases: wx._windows.Frame

Main frame of the configuration utility GUI.

get_configs()[source]¶
launch(prev_cfg_file)[source]¶

Create all the GUI elements and show the main window. Note that this needs to be separate from the __init__ method, since we need to set the top level window for wx before calling launch().

on_cancel(evnt)[source]¶

Event handler for cancel button events. Exits the program.

on_close(evnt)[source]¶

Event handler for close events - exits the program.

on_config_change()[source]¶
on_save(evnt)[source]¶

Event handler for Save button events. Opens a file selection dialog, reads the configs from the various panels and saves them to the selected file.

on_test(evnt)[source]¶

Event handler for Test button events. Opens a directory choice dialog to choose an image directory to test the configs on and then launches a config_test_frame. Note that if a config test frame already exists then clicking test simply updates the configuration that the config test frame is displaying

set_configs(configs)[source]¶
